title: The World’s Best Hairstylist
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Heh, heh, heh 𝅘𝅥𝅮 It’s done! Ayumu-chan, take a look in the mirror!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I-Isn’t this...... a bit too childish looking!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s not true! It’s the world’s cutest hairstyle.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>The world’s cutest hairstyle......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s exactly like Haruka-chan’s 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I see...... But then, if Haruka-chan has the world’s cutest hairstyle, then what does that make mine......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ayumu-chan, you’re also super, super cute. Kanata-chan used to do Haruka-chan’s hair~ Kanata-chan was so happy back then......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu, then Haruka-chan must also know that you’re the world’s best hairstylist.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah! But Kanata-chan hasn’t done this in a while~ Thanks for letting me do this, Ayumu-chan! Kanata-chan will do this for you until her arms fall off! Kanata-chan will make you the cutest girl there is~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ahaha, okay then! Please make me super cute, Kanata-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
